meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an encyclopedia.
meanings.sent1: Her encyclopaedic knowledge of history impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The encyclopaedic collection of books covered various subjects.
meanings.sent3: His encyclopaedic memory made him the star of the trivia night.
meanings.sent4: The encyclopaedic nature of her mind was like a library of facts.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopaedic details in the report left no room for doubt.
